N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 253.8 - Appeal procedures

State Regulations

The inmate shall be advised of his right to appeal the
disposition of the disciplinary hearing to the facility superintendent. Such
appeal shall be submitted in writing to the superintendent within 72 hours of
the receipt of the disposition. The superintendent or his designee shall issue
a decision within 15 days of receipt of the appeal. Notes
